title: Write Alternative Headlines for A/B Testing
description: An editor wants to test which headline drives more traffic to an article and needs to write several different options.

tasks.description: Read the article to fully understand its content and main angle.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has a deep understanding of the story.

tasks.description: Write five different headlines for the article, varying the tone and focus (e.g., a straightforward headline, a question-based headline, a controversial headline).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces five distinct and viable headline options.

tasks.description: Enter the headlines into the CMS's A/B testing tool to begin the test.
tasks.expected_outcome: The A/B test is configured and running.
